bibl.title: Letter from T. James Ennis to Philip Showalter Hench, January 7, 1948

div1.p: Ennis reports that he has reserved a room at the Hotel Nacional de Cuba for the Henches and Mrs. J.H. Kahler.

div1.head: Letter from T. James Ennis to Philip Showalter Hench, January 7, 1948
div1.opener:
Hotel Nacional de Cuba
H A V A N A
January 7th, 1948
AIR MAIL
Dr. P. S. Hench,
Mayo Clinic,
Rochester, Minn.
Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
In reply to your letter of December 17th, we
are now reserving a single room with private
bath for the arrival of Mrs. J. H. Kahler
who will be joining Mrs. Hench and yourself
on your visit on March 1st.

The rate for the single room will be $14.00
daily European plan.

We look forward to the pleasure of your visit,
and assuring you of our best service and atten-
tion, we remain,
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, HOTEL NACIONAL DE CUBA
T. James Ennis
Manager. TJE/CMM
cc: Mrs. Kahler.
